entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is a Norwegian Ridgeback dragon that Hagrid has been taking care of. He was mentioned as an option for Charlie to take care of in Romania.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who helped Hagrid with Norbert and suggested sending an owl to Charlie.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts who has been taking care of Norbert. He agreed to send an owl to Charlie.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is Ron's brother who is studying dragons in Romania and was suggested as someone to take care of Norbert.

relationships.description: Ron helped Hagrid with feeding Norbert.
Ron suggested sending an owl to Charlie to ask him to take care of Norbert.
Hagrid has been taking care of Norbert.
